title: Every Part of You: Resists Me
description: The dance has begun. Simone’s ready to follow all her desires, but reluctant Elliott isn’t ready to take the lead.After teasing Elliott into going dancing with her, Simone seduces him. She knows what she wants and isn’t afraid of asking for it, and Elliott appears to be as eager as she is to see where their passion takes them. The sex is electric, but Elliott is taken aback by his response to her, and when Simone reveals her kink for pain to him, he’s unable to accept it and tells her he doesn’t want to see her again.And then they’re both invited to the same party.
author: Megan Hart
